scripts.build:functions: npx lerna@6.6.2 bootstrap --scope=@soonaverse/functions && npx lerna@6.6.2 run build --scope=@soonaverse/functions --include-dependencies
scripts.build:interfaces: npx lerna@6.6.2 bootstrap --scope=@soonaverse/interfaces && npx lerna@6.6.2 run build --scope=@soonaverse/interfaces --include-dependencies
